Kapal Cruise Sandar di Gili Mas, Turis Australia Kagum dengan Lombok
05 Nov 2019, 15:07 by Akfa Nasrulhak


Foto: Dok Kemenhub

Jakarta - Kapal Cruise MV Sun Princess yang mengangkut wisatawan mancanegara menjadi kapal pertama yang berhasil sandar di Dermaga Cruise dan Peti Kemas Terminal Gili Mas, Lombok Barat.Wisatawan asing asal Australia James (48) yang ikut pelayaran MV. Sun Princess menyatakan kekagumannya dengan dermaga Gili Mas. Menurutnya, dermaga itu sangat bagus dan bersih, serta bisa disandari oleh kapal cruise dengan ukuran raksasa ini.Ia juga menyebutkan bahwa pulau Lombok juga menjadi destinasi wisata bagi warga Australia yang ingin berlibur karena keindahan pantai dan alamnya."Sangat terkesan dengan keramahtamahan petugas di pelabuhan dan terlebih lagi dermaga ini sangat bagus dan bersih. Terima kasih atas penerimaan kami yang sangat di luar dugaan kami dan kami pastikan akan datang kembali ke pulau ini suatu saat nanti bersama keluarga," tutur James, Selasa (5/11/2019).Kepala Bagian Hukum dan Kerjasama Luar Negeri Ditjen Perhubungan Laut Kemenhub Hasan Basri mengatakan pembangunan Terminal Gili Mas merupakan salah satu upaya dalam mendukung destinasi pariwisata super prioritas Mandalika dan pariwisata Lombok. "Telah kita saksikan bersama bahwa hari ini menjadi hari kebanggaan dari masyarakat Nusa Tenggara Barat, dapat kita lihat telah tersandarkan kapal dalam ukuran besar kapal cruise yang mengangkut wisatawan asing, tentunya ini sebuah potensi yang sangat dibanggakan dan ini juga dapat berpengaruh pada pendapatan daerah terutama pariwisata yang menjadi ikon," ucap Hasan.Hasan mewakili Sekretaris Direktorat Jenderal Perhubungan Laut saat menghadiri ujicoba sandar kapal cruise di Terminal Gili Mas, Lombok Barat NTB, Selasa (5/11).Selanjutnya, ia menjelaskan bahwa safety and security merupakan suatu hal yang sangat penting terkait kedatangan wisatawan asing. "Jika kita berbicara tentang orang asing tidak terlepas dari safety and security, bahwa sesuai dengan Peraturan Menteri Perhubungan Nomor PM 134 tahun 2016 tentang Manajemen Kapal dan Fasilitas Pelabuhan sesuatu hal yang tidak dipisahkan dari keberadaan orang asing yang masuk wilayah kita," kata Hasan."Karena bagaimana pun area-area yang harus steril ada jaminan untuk pemberian keamanan di wilayah pelabuhan sehingga orang-orang asing merasa percaya diri, merasa nyaman dan merasa tidak ada rasa kekhawatiran terhadap keamanan yang ada di Indonesia terutama di wilayah kawasan pelabuhan," sambungnya.


Foto: Dok Kemenhub

Sebagai informasi, Dermaga Cruise di Terminal Gili mas dibangun sepanjang 440 meter dan lebar 26 meter dengan kedalaman kolam pelabuhan yang mencapai -14 meter LWS (low water spring/rata-rata permukaan air.Selain itu, Kapal Cruise MV Sun Princess yang dinakhodai oleh Capt. Kent Thomas William Henry berukuran GT 77.441 memiliki dimensi Length Overall (LOA) 221,4 meter, dan lebar 32,25 meter meter membawa wisatawan asing sejumlah 2.031 penumpang dan 828 crew yang berlayar dari Fremantle, Australia menuju Port Kelang, Malaysia.Di Lombok, para wisatawan akan mengunjungi beberapa objek wisata di antaranya ke Taman Narmada, pusat kerajinan Cukli Sayang- Sayang, Lingsar, Pantai Senggigi, Gili Trawangan, Museum, Desa pengrajin tenun Sukarara, Desa Sade, kerajinan gerabah Banyumulek, dan Mandalika sebagai salah satu destinasi wisata super prioritas.Pada kesempatan yang sama, Kepala Kantor Kesyahbandaran dan Otoritas Pelabuhan (KSOP) Kelas III M. Junaidin mengungkapkan bahwa dermaga tersebut diproyeksikan menjadi lokasi singgah kapal-kapal pesiar baik dari dalam maupun luar negeri. Kapal bisa langsung bersandar di dermaga sehingga wisatawan tidak perlu lagi menggunakan sekoci untuk mencapai daratan seperti yang selama ini dilakukan di Pelabuhan Lembar.Ia juga mengapresiasi Pemerintah Daerah dalam keseriusannya mengembangkan potensi pariwisata di Nusa Tenggara Barat. "Alhamdulillah hari ini bisa kita lihat keseriusan Pemerintah Daerah khususnya Pemerintah Provinsi NTB, kami beberapa kali dikunjungi dan diberikan support," tutur Junaidin.Lebih lanjut, dirinya mengungkapkan bahwa apa yang terjadi hari ini merupakan momentum bagi kebangkitan Nusa Tenggara Barat khususnya Lombok pasca diguncang gempa bumi beberapa waktu silam. "Saya pikir pelabuhan Gili Mas ini tentu menjadi modal besar bagi NTB khususnya untuk Lombok karena kita bicara kegiatan yang sudah dicanangkan seperti Moto GP, selain itu juga Kawasan Ekonomi Khusus," kata Junaidin."Orientasi kita nanti ke depan Pelabuhan Gili Mas ini bisa dikatakan kita untuk melayani kegiatan internasional baik itu dalam penumpangnya maupun muatan, ini nanti menjadi target kita ke depan," ungkapnya.Turut hadir dalam ujicoba Sandar Kapal Cruise ini Wakil Gubernur Nusa Tenggara Barat Sitti Rohmi Djalilah, Direktur Operasi dan Komersial PT Pelindo III Putut Sri Muljanto, perwakilan Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman, Direktur Polairud Polda NTB, Komandan Pangkalan TNI AL Mataram dan Kepala Dinas Pariwisata Prov. Sandar Cruise Boat on Gili Mas, Australian Tourists Amazed with Lombok
05 Nov 2019, 15:07 by Akfa Nasrulhak


Photo: Doc Kemenhub

Jakarta - MV Sun Princess Cruise Ship carrying foreign tourists became the first ship to successfully dock at Cruise Pier and Container Terminal at Gili Mas, West Lombok. Australian foreign tourist James (48) who participated in the MV cruise. Sun Princess expressed her admiration for the Gili Mas pier. According to him, the pier was very good and clean, and could be anchored by a giant cruise ship. He also mentioned that the island of Lombok was also a tourist destination for Australians who wanted to take a vacation because of the beauty of the beach and its nature. "Very impressed with the hospitality of officers at the port and moreover this pier is very nice and clean. Thank you for our reception which is beyond our expectations and we will definitely come back to this island someday with family, "James said, Tuesday (11/05/2019). The Department of Foreign Affairs and Legal Cooperation of the Directorate General of Sea Transportation of the Ministry of Transportation Hasan Basri said the development of the Gili Mas Terminal was one of the efforts in supporting the Mandalika super priority tourism destination and Lombok tourism. "We have witnessed together that today is a day of pride for the people of West Nusa Tenggara, we can see that it has been anchored in large size cruise ships carrying foreign tourists, of course this is a potential that is very proud of and this can also affect regional income, especially tourism which became an icon, "Hasan said. Hasan represented the Secretary of the Directorate General of Sea Transportation when attending a cruise ship berth test at the Gili Mas Terminal, West Lombok, West Nusa Tenggara, Tuesday (11/5). Furthermore, he explained that safety and security was a very important matter. important related to the arrival of foreign tourists. "If we talk about foreigners, it is inseparable from safety and security, that according to Minister of Transportation Regulation PM No. 134 of 2016 concerning Ship Management and Port Facilities, something that is not separated from the presence of foreigners entering our territory," Hasan said. Because after all the areas that must be sterile there are guarantees for providing security in the port area so that foreigners feel confident, feel comfortable and feel there is no sense of concern for security in Indonesia, especially in the port area, "he continued.


Photo: Doc Kemenhub

For information, the Cruise Pier at the Gili Mas Terminal was built along 440 meters and 26 meters wide with a depth of the harbor pool reaching -14 meters LWS (low water spring / average water level). In addition, the MV Sun Princess Cruise Ship, led by Capt Kent Thomas William Henry, GT 77,441, has a Length Overall dimension (LOA) of 221.4 meters, and a width of 32.25 meters, carrying 2,031 foreign passengers and 828 crew who sailed from Fremantle, Australia to Port Kelang, Malaysia. , tourists will visit several attractions including Narmada Park, the Cukli Sayang-Sayang craft center, Lingsar, Senggigi Beach, Gili Trawangan, Museum, Sukarara weaving craftsman village, Sade village, Sade handicraft, Banyumulek earthenware craft, and Mandalika as one of the tourist destinations. super priority. On the same occasion, Head of Class III Port Authority and Port Authority (KSOP) M. Junaidin revealed that the pier Projected to be a stopover location for cruise ships both from within and outside the country. The ship can lean directly on the pier so that tourists no longer need to use a lifeboat to reach the mainland as has been done at the Port of Sheets. He also appreciated the Regional Government in its seriousness in developing the tourism potential in West Nusa Tenggara. "Thank God, today we can see the seriousness of the Regional Government, especially the NTB Provincial Government, we have been visited several times and given support," said Junaidin. Furthermore, he revealed that what happened today was a momentum for the revival of West Nusa Tenggara, especially Lombok after the earthquake shaking. the earth some time ago. "I think the port of Gili Mas is certainly a big capital for NTB, especially for Lombok because we are talking about activities that have been launched such as the Moto GP, besides that it is also a Special Economic Zone," said Junaidin. "Our orientation to the future of the Gili Mas Port can be said we are to serve international activities both in passengers and cargo, this will be our target going forward, "he said. According to present at the Cruise Ship Sandar trial, Deputy Governor of West Nusa Tenggara Sitti Rohmi Djalilah, Director of Operations and Commercial of PT Pelindo III Putut Sri Muljanto , representatives of the Coordinating Ministry for Maritime Affairs, Director of NTB Regional Police, the Navy Base Commander of Mataram and the Head of the Provincial Tourism Office.
